Facts Over Time (Trino/Snowflake Implementation)

Source: R/facts_over_time.R
check_fot_group.Rd

Facts Over Time (Trino/Snowflake Implementation)

Usage

check_fot_group(
  fot_tbl,
  omop_or_pcornet = "omop",
  time_frame,
  lookback_interval = 1,
  check_string = "fot",
  visits_only = TRUE,
  distinct_visits = TRUE
)

Arguments

fot_tbl

a table with information describing the fact tables that should be examined; see ?fot_input_omop or ?fot_input_pcornet for details

omop_or_pcornet

string indicating the CDM format of the data; defaults to omop

time_frame

a table of dates that should be iterated through to retrieve the facts for each time period; has columns: time_start, time_end

lookback_interval

the number of time periods (defined in check_fot) to look back; defaults to 1

check_string

the abbreviated name of the check; defaults to fot

visits_only

if TRUE, counts ONLY distinct visits and not patients or rows

distinct_visits

if TRUE, counts distinct visits as well as total counts and total patients

Value

a dataframe with one row for each time period within the specified time span for each check;

  • if visits_only = TRUE, will produce only counts of visits for the check + time period

  • if visits_only = FALSE and distinct_visits = TRUE, will produce counts of patients, rows, and visits for the check + time period

  • if visits_only = FALSE and distinct_visits = FALSE, will produce counts of patients and rows for the check + time period
